title: Encore Magazine Best of for the years 2004 to 2008
content:
Submitted by [Patrick Marc Sommer](http://web.archive.org/web/20090618073206/http:/typophile.com/user/10234 "View user profile.") : 30.Nov.2008 5.07am 

We admit to be a bit proud of what has accumulated in our archives through the years. Of course, one always thinks a bit melancholically about the past on such occasions, yet our thoughts are more focused on the happily anticipated future.

Have fun browsing the pages! We hope that this issue sweetens the waiting time until Encore is relaunched.

[http://www.magwerk.com/mag.php?magazine=encore&language=en](http://web.archive.org/web/20090618073206/http:/www.magwerk.com/mag.php?magazine=encore&language=en "http://www.magwerk.com/mag.php?magazine=encore&language=en") english  
 [http://www.magwerk.com/mag.php?magazine=encore&language=de](http://web.archive.org/web/20090618073206/http:/www.magwerk.com/mag.php?magazine=encore&language=de "http://www.magwerk.com/mag.php?magazine=encore&language=de") deutsch
